author: Brendan Kuty | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: NLDS TV schedule: New York Mets vs. Los Angeles Dodgers Game 3 live stream: Time, TV, channel, how to watch online
text:
The New York Mets and Los Angeles Dodgers play Game 3 of the National League Division Series Saturday night.
The Dodgers won Game 2 on Saturday, 5-2.
Mets righty Matt Harvey (13-8, 2.71 ERA) will face Dodgers lefty Brett Anderson (10-9, 3.69 ERA)
Here's everything you need to know about watching the game:
